text: hi my name is Cole and I 7 years old
this is the story of the time I learned
how to hit a baseball without a tea
baseball is my favorite sport I've been

and I'm a pretty good hater but it was
time to get rid of the tea and I was

he threw it to me from far away it's
pretty hard to hit a

more
ball it looked like it was coming in
